content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command from your computer to download a PDF guide titled "Identifying Trees of Michigan" from a Michigan State University Extension website, but it could not be executed due to a host resolution error. You requested a Google search for "identifying trees of Michigan pdf." Your computer returned a list of resources, including a revised 2022 edition of the "Identifying Trees of Michigan" guide from Michigan State University Extension, a PDF on tree identification basics in Michigan, and a guide to Michigan\'s species from the Michigan Department of Natural Resources. Other resources include a tree identification tool from arborday.org and a guide to the trees of the Great Lakes region.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.canr.msu.edu/resources/identifying-trees-of-michigan-e2332-revised-2022", "question": "How do I download the PDF?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: To download the PDF for "Identifying Trees of Michigan: E2332 Revised 2022," one can click on the "DOWNLOAD FILE" button located at the top of the article. \n \n Links: [\'\\n\\n\\n (https://msu.edu/)\', \'MSU Extension (https://www.canr.msu.edu/outreach/about/home_page)\', \'Natural Resources (https://www.canr.msu.edu/natural_resources/index)\', \'Programs (https://www.canr.msu.edu/natural_resources/programs)\', \'Experts (https://www.canr.msu.edu/natural_resources/experts)\']'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "wget https://www.canr.msu.edu/sites/default/files/documents/2022-05/E2332-Identifying-Trees-Michigan-2022-05.pdf"}}}'}]
"""
